translation.outputPlaceholder: Translation results will be displayed here...

ocr.completed: Text recognition completed! Please click the translate button to proceed.
ocr.noTextFound: No text could be recognized. Please try using a clearer image.
ocr.dropToRecognize: Drop to recognize text from image

settings.title: Settings
settings.customModelPlaceholder: Enter custom model ID, e.g.: gpt-4o-2024-08-06
settings.smartSwitchDesc: Automatically switch to English translation when inputting Chinese, and to Chinese translation when inputting English
settings.azureNote: Find the key in the Cognitive Services resource in Azure Portal
settings.ollamaNote: Local Ollama usually doesn't require an API key, you can leave it empty or enter any value
settings.securityNote: Note: Your API key will be securely stored in your local browser and will not be uploaded to any server.
settings.supportedServices: Supported services: OpenAI, Claude, Azure OpenAI, Ollama local deployment and other services compatible with OpenAI API format.
settings.smartSwitchDescription: Automatically switch to English translation when inputting Chinese, and to Chinese translation when inputting English

messages.apiKeyRequired: API key is not configured. Please click the settings button in the upper right corner to configure your API key before translation.
messages.testRequired: Please configure API key and URL first
messages.testSuccess: Connection test successful! API configuration is valid.
messages.invalidApiKey: Invalid API key, please check your key configuration
messages.rateLimited: Too many requests, please try again later
messages.accessDenied: API access denied, please check your permission configuration
messages.timeout: Connection timeout, please check network or API address
messages.networkError: Network connection failed, please check API address and network connection
messages.unsupportedFormat: Unsupported image format. Please use JPG, PNG or WEBP format.
messages.fileTooLarge: Image file is too large. Please select an image smaller than 10MB.
